column1: Narrator : The island isn’t larger than a few galleys.
Narrator : CAPITAINE is in front of big tent. Above the entrance is a rough sign shaped like a question mark.
column2: Narrator : CAPITAINE is in front of big tent. Above the entrance is a rough sign shaped like a question mark.
Choice : Do you know where the treasure of NOMTRESOR lays?
column6: Choice : This is a hold up! (attack)
column7: Choice : How's life as a seer? (quest)
OtherSpeak : I had to do something with the powers I was blessed with...

column13: Narrator : The place is filled with letters and books.
column14: Narrator : The place is filled with old maps, manuscripts and compasses. So much for psychic powers...

column13: Narrator : Here lived nothing more than a filthy crook.
column14: Narrator : Some mention the NOMTRESOR and lead DIRECTIONTOFORMULA from here.

column1: OtherSpeak : Obviously, I know everything, eheheheh...
OtherSpeak : But I'm not telling you anything for less than 15 gold coins...

column3: OtherSpeak : You need more money, kiddo! Eheheh...

column1: OtherSpeak : That will be 3 gold coins per imparted wisdom!

column4: OtherSpeak : You don’t have 3 measly coins?

column2: Choice : That will be all for today.
